motions.title: Consent Agenda Approval
motions.description: Approval of consent agenda including: • May 28, 2024 meeting minutes • Resolution to surplus twelve vehicles and one trailer

specialEvents.title: Administration of Oath of Office - Officer Sebastian Wright
specialEvents.description: Mayor Deutsch administered oath of office to Officer Sebastian Wright.

discussionItems.title: Updating Permitting Fee Schedule to Comply with State Law Changes
discussionItems.description: Discussion of proposed updated fee schedule due to HB461 changing how cities may calculate permitting fees. Proposed flat fees of $175 for residential and $350 for commercial permits under $75,000 valuation.
